item.title: 英伟达投资者在财报发布前应对中国风险
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）在中国的销售情况呈现出新的复杂性，投资者希望该芯片制造商在周三下午公布财报时能有更清晰的解读。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s China sales have taken on new levels of complexity, and investors will be hoping for a clearer read when the chipmaker reports earnings Wednesday afternoon.】

item.title: 保费和投资收益扩大，中国人寿利润上升
item.description: 按市场份额计算，中国最大的人寿保险公司中国人寿保险股份有限公司称，上半年利润增长 6.9%，原因是保单销售扩大，以及在动荡的股市中提高了投资回报。【原文：China Life Insurance Co., the nation’s largest life insurer by market share, said profit rose 6.9% in the first half, as policy sales expanded and it boosted investment returns in a volatile stock market.】

item.title: 日本比特币国库寻求从海外股票中获得 8.8 亿美元资金
item.description: 日本 Metaplanet 公司计划通过在海外市场发行新股筹集高达 1303 亿日元（约合 8.8 亿美元）的资金，这是该公司在股价下滑之际为购买比特币筹集现金的最新举措。【原文：Japan’s Metaplanet Inc. plans to raise up to ¥130.3 billion ($880 million) by issuing new shares in overseas markets in its latest bid to secure cash to buy Bitcoin as its stock slumps.】

item.title: 欧元躲过法国动荡，期权显示看涨押注
item.description: 货币期权显示出市场对欧元的强劲需求，表明该共同货币正在设法再次躲避法国政治动荡的影响。【原文：Currency options show robust appetite for the euro and suggest the common currency is managing to dodge the fallout from political turmoil in France once again.】

item.title: 交易员期待英伟达财报搅动平静股市
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）将于周三收盘后公布季度财报，期权交易员们押注于一件事：该报告将推动市场走势。【原文：Nvidia Corp. delivers quarterly earnings after the bell Wednesday and options traders are betting on one thing: the report will move the market.】

item.title: 达拉塔酒店首席执行官称英国酒店需求 "疲软 "影响盈利
item.description: 达拉塔酒店集团（Dalata Hotel Group Plc）首席执行官德莫特-克劳利（Dermot Crowley）表示，英国旅游业和酒店业正在经历一个特别具有挑战性的时期，这损害了这家爱尔兰酒店运营商的收益。【原文：Dalata Hotel Group Plc’s Chief Executive Officer Dermot Crowley said the UK tourism and hotel industry is going through a particularly challenging period, hurting earnings at the Irish hotel operator.】

item.title: 美团在与阿里巴巴的送餐大战中利润下滑
item.description: 美团的利润在与竞争对手阿里巴巴集团和 JD.com Inc. 的价格战中化为乌有，这是一个最显著的迹象，表明美团在利润丰厚的国内市场的长期主导地位正受到威胁。【原文：Meituan’s profit got wiped out in a price-based battle with rivals Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and JD.com Inc., the most striking sign yet that its longstanding dominance in a lucrative home market is under threat.】

item.title: 油价下跌、需求疲软，中国石油化工股份有限公司利润下滑
item.description: 由于关税波动和国内市场需求低迷导致油价暴跌，中国石油天然气股份有限公司上半年利润下滑。【原文：China’s Cnooc Ltd. saw profits slump in the first half of the year as oil prices tumbled amid tariff volatility and muted demand in its domestic market.】

item.title: 亿万富翁穆通基金会收购南非学校公司
item.description: 一个与南非最大银行创始人、亿万富翁詹尼-穆通（Jannie Mouton）有关联的基金会计划以约 71 亿兰特（4 亿美元）的价格收购南非顶级私立教育集团。【原文：A foundation linked to billionaire Jannie Mouton, a founder of South Africa’s biggest bank, plans to acquire the country’s top private education group for about 7.1 billion rand ($400 million).】

item.title: 受高利率诱惑，俄罗斯人在银行囤积 5000 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 俄罗斯家庭利用战时经济中储蓄账户的历史高利率，积累了创纪录的银行存款。【原文：Russian households have amassed a record amount of bank deposits as they take advantage of historically high interest rates for savings accounts in the wartime economy.】

item.title: 达能达拉公司和 GEM 将开发价值 14 亿美元的印尼镍厂
item.description: 印尼主权财富基金达纳塔拉公司（Danantara）与中国创业板股份有限公司（GEM Co. Ltd. ）签署了一份价值 14.2 亿美元的 "魁首协议"，以开发一家生产电池级镍的工厂。【原文：Indonesian sovereign wealth fund Danantara has signed a $1.42 billion heads of agreement with Chinese company GEM Co. Ltd. to develop a plant producing battery-grade nickel.】

item.title: 德意志银行和德国商业银行因高盛分析师下调评级而下滑
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）和德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）被高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Shares in Deutsche Bank AG and Commerzbank AG dropped after they were downgraded by Goldman Sachs Group Inc. analysts, who cited a recent run-up in both stocks for the move.】

item.title: Capitec 超越 FirstRand 成为最有价值非洲银行
item.description: Capitec Bank Holdings Ltd.超越 FirstRand Ltd.，成为非洲最有价值的银行，一个月前，这家连续四年公布创纪录利润的银行新任首席执行官上任。【原文：Capitec Bank Holdings Ltd. overtook FirstRand Ltd. to become Africa’s most valuable bank, a month after a new chief executive officer took over at the lender that’s reported record profits for four straight years.】

item.title: 香港主要利率升破 3% 为经济带来风险
item.description: 本周，香港的流动性状况继续收紧，主要货币市场利率攀升至一些分析师认为可能会抑制经济复苏的水平之上。【原文：Liquidity conditions in Hong Kong resumed tightening this week with a key money-market rate climbing above a level that some analysts say may stifle a nascent economic recovery.】

item.title: 野村称韩国押注美国造船业面临利润风险
item.description: 野村集团（Nomura Group）称，韩国希望利用其造船企业帮助重振美国陷入困境的造船业，这威胁到了亚洲国家自己造船厂的盈利能力。【原文：South Korea’s ambition of leveraging its shipbuilders to help revive America’s struggling sector threatens the profitability of the Asian country’s own yards, according to Nomura Group.】

item.title: 维托尔将发运制裁解除后的首批叙利亚原油
item.description: 自西方解除对大马士革的制裁以来，维托尔集团（Vitol Group）将装载第一批叙利亚原油，因为该国的能源工业正试图从十多年的武装冲突破坏中恢复过来。【原文：Vitol Group is set to load the first cargo of Syrian crude oil since the lifting of western sanctions on Damascus as the country’s energy industry attempts to recover of more than a decade of destruction from armed conflict.】

item.title: 欧洲股市重拾涨势，关注英伟达的人工智能线索
item.description: 欧洲股市走高，原因是市场焦点转向英伟达公司的财报，以寻找人工智能需求前景的线索，同时投资者也在关注法国的政治动态。【原文：European stocks advanced as focus turned to Nvidia Corp.’s earnings for clues on the outlook for artificial intelligence demand, while investors monitored political developments in France.】

item.title: 阿联酋阿德诺克公司扩大液化天然气销售，签订 15 年印度供应协议
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国最大的石油生产商同意向印度石油公司供应为期 15 年的液化天然气，因为该公司正在为一个新的出口终端争取更多具有约束力的合同。【原文：The biggest oil producer in the United Arab Emirates agreed to supply liquefied natural gas to Indian Oil Corp. for 15 years as it lines up more binding contracts for a new export terminal.】

item.title: 报道称意大利考虑征收新银行税以充实预算
item.description: 据意大利多家报纸报道，意大利政府正再次寻求利用银行利润来支撑公共财政。【原文：The Italian government is again seeking to tap into bank profits as a way to prop up public finances, according to various reports in Italian newspapers.】

item.title: 乐高押注亚洲，销售额创纪录，市场份额攀升
item.description: 在周三公布了创纪录的半年销售数字后，乐高公司（Lego A/S）表示将通过加倍努力开拓亚洲市场来保持发展势头。【原文：After posting record half-year sales figures on Wednesday, Lego A/S said it would sustain its momentum by doubling down on the market in Asia.】

item.title: 政治投票在即，法国市场在大跌后趋于稳定
item.description: 周三早盘，法国股市企稳，在下月可能引发政府垮台的关键投票前带来了一些喘息机会。【原文：French assets steadied in early trading on Wednesday, bringing some respite ahead of a key vote next month that could trigger a collapse in the government.】

item.title: 越南开放黄金市场，随着垄断结束发生 "关键性转变
item.description: 越南正在开放黄金市场，结束国家对黄金原料进出口和金条生产的垄断，此举可能会增加供应，缩小当地价格与全球价格之间的差距。【原文：Vietnam is opening up its gold market, ending a state monopoly on imports and exports of raw bullion as well as producing bars, in a move that may boost supply and narrow a gap between local and global prices.】

item.title: 康佰康短暂超越茅台成为中国最贵股票
item.description: 一家中国领先的芯片制造商短暂取代了一家顶级白酒巨头，成为中国最昂贵的在岸股票，因为投资者加倍看好创新型科技公司，继续推动大盘反弹。【原文：A leading Chinese chipmaker briefly replaced a top liquor giant as the country’s most expensive onshore stock, as investors doubled down on innovative technology firms to keep driving a broader rally.】

item.title: 里约新任首席执行官特洛特通过合并业务简化矿业公司的运作
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）的新任首席执行官合并了集团的几大业务，希望简化这家全球第二大矿业公司。【原文：Rio Tinto Group’s new chief executive officer has combined some of its biggest businesses as he looks to simplify the world’s No. 2 miner.】

item.title: 中国泡沫红茶连锁店 Mixue 上半年销售额增长 39
item.description: 中国泡沫红茶连锁店美雪集团今年上半年收入增长强劲，因为其低价饮品继续在注重成本的中国年轻消费者中引起共鸣。【原文：Chinese bubble tea chain Mixue Group reported robust revenue growth in the first half of the year, as its low-priced drinks continued to resonate with cost-conscious young Chinese consumers.】

item.title: Blackstone 寻求修改并延长 9.57 亿美元的 Interplex 贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Blackstone 正在与银行商谈修改和延长其 9.57 亿美元贷款，该贷款为其收购新加坡精密工程公司 Interplex Holdings Pte.【原文：Blackstone is in talks with banks to amend and extend its $957 million loan that had backed its acquisition of Singaporean precision engineering firm Interplex Holdings Pte., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 三菱退出日本三个海上风电项目
item.description: 以三菱公司为首的一个集团退出了日本的三个海上风电项目；这是该行业在全球范围内遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：A group led by Mitsubishi Corp. withdrew from three offshore wind projects in Japan — the latest global setback for the sector.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑下跌，英国股市有望跑赢大盘
瑞士有可能避免通货紧缩：瑞士国家银行的马丁对《时代金融》的看法
item.description: 瑞士央行副行长安托万-马丁（Antoine Martin）表示，尽管瑞士经济面临关税不确定性，但仍有可能避免通货紧缩。【原文：Switzerland is likely to stave off deflation despite the tariff uncertainties facing its economy, according to central bank Vice President Antoine Martin.】

item.title: 炒掉库克不足以满足特朗普的要求
item.description:
如果抵押贷款利率下降得不够，债券市场的干预可能会随之而来。【原文：

If mortgage rates don’t fall enough, intervention in bond markets could follow. 

】
